page.title: 02Local History
page.content:
{BOLSOVER
The town is locally known as{'Bowzer'. It takes its name from{'over',}meaning a high place, and from{'Bel'}or {'Baal',}the name of a heathen God. Bolsover therefore signifies{'Bel's {high place'.
{BOLSOVER ILLUMINATIONS/FLOWER SHOW
There used to be a Flower Show in the Castle Grounds and illuminations in Sherwood Lodge, both annual events. Alison's great uncle had a private bus which brought people from Langold in Nottinghamshire to the show. As well as the illuminations in Sherwood Lodge, the castle was floodlit for the occasion.
